name: Da Rocket Cave
description:
A small game made while learning Unity with the help of one course.

This game has such exciting features as:

  • A rocket that can fly and spin (also has a built-in flashlight)!
  • 6 (potentially) fun levels to play through!
  • A lives system with 3 whole lives to waste on the aforementioned levels!
  • Main menu!
  • Victory Screen!

More info here: https://community.gamedev.tv/t/da-rocket-cave-aka-my-project-boost/106867/1
